alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 3:47AM CDT until April 22 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN COLFAX...EASTERN PLATTE AND SOUTHERN STANTON COUNTIES... At 347 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Schuyler, or 10 miles northeast of Columbus, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Leigh, Platte Center, Lake North Babcock Campground, 9 Miles North Of Schuyler, Central Community College, College View Trailer Park, Circle H Trailer Park, Shell Creek Elementary School, Maple Creek Recreation Area and Camp Luther. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
